name: Milstolpe 1 | Crops - Rolf Eneström
description:
Go to the tree to see what he wants and grow those crops for him. The different crops have their own planting-area which are marked with their respective signs. Pick up the crops in time so they dont rot, but don't worry u can still use the rotten crops in the compost bin to make fertilizer.

The game ends when the smog (the fog) disappears and the tree doesn't want any more crops!

Hope you enyoy :D
